======================  ============================================================
Attribute               Description
======================  ============================================================
basis                   basis set
charge                  molecular charge
chk                     name of the checkpoint file as specified
                        in the Link0 section (``%chk=``)
chk_consistent          Boolean to check whether the checkpoint file specified
                        in the Link0
                        section is equal to the name of the output file with a chk
                        extension. 
comment                 comment specified in the input file
cputime                 used CPU time in seconds
dipole                  dipole moment in Debye
energies                list of electronic energies found after each instance of
                        ``HF Done``
energy                  last electronic energy, found after last instance of 
                        ``HF Done``
enthalpy
enthalpycorrection
error
file
files
frequencies
geometries
geometries_standard
geometry
gibbs
gibbscorrection
irc
keywords
lot
lowest_frequency
memory
method
mulliken_charges
multiplicity
nimag
npa_charges
nproc
pressure
route_section
scalings
scan
scrf
scrf_nonstandard_input
steps
stoichiometry
temperature
thermal
thermalcorrection
zpe
zpesum
======================  ============================================================
